metadata.description: Once again, Fred proves that there's just too much story in the GD-verse to contain in one series! Enjoy the tribulations of Ayane "Mistress" Anno, the gorgeous -- but -- frightening champion freestyle fighter, in her search to add a little cuteness to her life, and the ongoing adventures of the Northern Edge Guard as they face the problems accompanying new recruits, evil death-wabbits, and more!
metadata.name: Gold Digger: Tangent
